definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: The idea behind the Template layer is that the presentation layer code is separate from the business-layer code.
sentences.chinese: 模板層背後的思想就是表示層代碼與業務層代碼分離。

sentences.english: Basic concepts resemble other frameworks that separate the presentation layer from the code.
sentences.chinese: 其基本概念與把表示層和代碼分隔開的其他框架相似。

sentences.english: The layer of denotation was implemented by the building field .
sentences.chinese: 拼搭場內實現了系統的表示層。

sentences.english: The code responsible for the presentation layer.
This core has no dependency to any particular presentation technology.
sentences.chinese: 該核心並不依賴於任何特定的表示層技術。

sentences.english: It keeps the presentation layer separate from the application layer.
sentences.chinese: 它把表示層和應用程序層分隔開。

sentences.english: The consumer layer is sometimes called the presentation layer.
sentences.chinese: 使用者層有時候稱爲表示層。
